name: Kagool
tagline: Award winning Sitecore agency and Platinum Partner
description:
Kagool are an award-winning digital agency specialising in Sitecore. Since their formation in 1999, Kagool have helped businesses across a variety of industries achieve a positive return on investment through digital strategy.
Consistent delivery of high-quality web development, digital marketing and strategy resulted in Kagool becoming a Sitecore Platinum Partner. There are only 40 Platinum Partners in the world, with just ten in the UK. 
Today, Kagool operate with a team of 61, including three of the UKâ€™s 18 Sitecore MVPs (Most Valuable Professionals). With over 250 Sitecore projects completed in the last eight years, Kagool now have offices in Manchester, London and Cardiff.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 5th Floor, St Georges House 56 Peter Street
